description: List the groups a given user is member of
name: active_directory.get_user_groups

api_pass.description: The password for the purpose created user

api_user.description: The purpose created user to interact with the ISE api

base_api_resource.description: The base resource used for this API Request (https://ise-pan.domain.com:9060/ers/config/{base_api_resource}/{id}/getUserGroups)

connection_name.description: The name of the connection in the pack config that should be used. Specifying fields such as 'api_user' or 'api_pass' will override that value in 'config.connections.connection_name' if configured.

hostname.description: The base fqdn for the Policy Administration Node (PAN)

http_method.description: the HTTP Method to be used for this action

payload.description: A JSON object with the data that should be used for payload. See action definition for details (JSONSchema). https://developer.cisco.com/docs/identity-services-engine/#!active-directory/get-user-groups

resource_id.description: The ID of the Active Directory User

url_tail.description: The string that comes after the value of "resource_id", appended in action.py

use_http.description: Connect to ISE using HTTP (Very insecure, should only be used for testing!)

verify_ssl.description: SSL verification for the ISE server, set to 'false' to skip SSL verification
